bibl.title: Texts and Artifacts: A Spatial Analysis of Papyri at Karanis. Avec résumé en anglais.

Introduction. - Historiographical context. - Case study: The spatial distribution of papyri at Karanis: Research questions; - Data set and methodology; - Context; - Analysis and results. - Conclusions and future directions. - Maps, figure and charts.
